name: send systemctl cmd
set cmds
func:
msg.cmds = ["disable", "stop"]
return msg;

name: set cmds
func:
msg.cmds = ["enable", "start"]
return msg;

name: set cmds
func:
msg.cmds = ["restart"]
return msg;

name: set cmds
func:
node.send({ "payload": "sudo /bin/systemctl disable comitup" })
node.send({ "payload": "sudo /bin/systemctl stop comitup" })
node.send({ "payload": "/usr/local/sbin/wifi-nuke.py" })
node.send({ "payload": "sudo /usr/bin/nmcli device disconnect wlan0" })

name: Restart Daemons
Current Aircraft Count
function 1
func:
msg.payload = parseFloat(msg.payload).toFixed(1)
return msg;

name: Average CPUs
GPS Mode Lookup
SDR List
Set HTML Payload
Set Config Path
func:
msg.confPath = `/home/node-red/${msg.payload}`;

return msg;

name: Read Flow Configs
Remove nulls
Format ENV file
Use tmp file
func:
msg.tmpConfPath = msg.topic.replace("/boot/", "tmp-__boot__")

return msg;
